name: a new home (hungertod)
description:
I highly recommend the Windows version over the Web version

Have you ever wondered what life will look like in a couple of years? It might be like this dystopian scenario, so you better be prepared. Practice your astronautic skills and save the few remaining people on earth. Are you ready to bear this responsibilty?

This game was made for the Beginners Circle Jam #3 over a time period of 2 weeks. Since i haven't had enough time for this jam i couldn't implement all features I had in mind. I tried to do my best for my first game in the time I had and I think the game turned out quite well.
